message.name: ERR_XRV_PDF_FORM_PROGRAM_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this PDF Form as associations to Programs exist.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: A PDF Form with the same Name already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_FILE_TYPE_INCORRECT
message.locale: The PDF file must be in PDF format.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PDF_FILE_LOCALE_EXISTS
message.locale: A PDF file for this locale currently exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The name of this PDF resource cannot be longer than %1s characters.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DESC_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Description must be less than or equal to %1s characters.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SERVICE_AREA_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: A Service Area must be selected for the chosen Local Office.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PDF_FORM_APPLICATION_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this PDF Form as associations to Online Applications exist.
